worldfot.name: AFC Champions League
worldfot.description: The AFC Champions League is the premier club competition in Asia, contested by top football clubs from the continent's domestic leagues.

worldfot.name: WC Qualification CAF
worldfot.description: The WC Qualification CAF is the qualification tournament for the FIFA World Cup, featuring national teams from the Confederation of African Football (CAF).

worldfot.name: Primera B Nacional
worldfot.description: The Primera B Nacional is the second division of the Argentine football league system, featuring clubs aiming to secure promotion to the Primera División.

worldfot.name: Liga Profesional
worldfot.description: The Liga Profesional is the top professional football division in Argentina, featuring the best clubs in the country competing for the national championship.

worldfot.name: Supercopa Argentina
worldfot.description: The Supercopa Argentina is an annual football competition in Argentina contested between the winners of the Primera División and the Copa Argentina.

worldfot.name: A League
worldfot.description: The A-League is the top-tier professional football league in Australia, featuring the country's best football clubs competing for the national championship.

worldfot.name: Bundesliga
worldfot.description: The Bundesliga is the top professional football division in Austria, featuring clubs from Austria competing for the national title.

worldfot.name: Erste Liga
worldfot.description: The Erste Liga is the second-tier football league in Austria, where teams compete for promotion to the Bundesliga.

worldfot.name: Copa Liga Profesional
worldfot.description: The Copa Liga Profesional is an annual football competition in Argentina contested by teams from the Primera División.
